attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: So I wanted an app about the annoying orange, but apparently I downloaded the wrong because this annoying orange makes bad tweets, racist, a rapist, and quite possibly the worst president ever.

attributes.title: scam
attributes.review: this app will scam you! an ad popped up offering free sandwhiches, so obviously i clicked it bc who doesn’t like free sandwhiches, and they didn’t give me free sandwhiches! i bet this app also steals data & information. do not get this app at all costs. or, get it and rate it a 1 star.

attributes.title: What the heck???
attributes.review: I was so excited to see that Donald Trump had an app. I love to hear is updates so I was just so delighted to see that there was finally an app catering to the needs of the great likeminded people of our hardworking America. But when I got the app, I was absolutely FLABBERGASTED!!!!!!!! Frightening images of Kermit the frog and headless baby dolls, pictured in extremely exposed and un inviting colors were all that I could see on the app. Anyways, I think I’ll have to vote for Kanye now
